metadata.name: Github Secret Scanning Feature Disabled
metadata.comment: Detects if the secret scanning feature is disabled for an enterprise or repository.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM vulnerability_finding WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(LOWER(action)) in ('business_secret_scanning\.disable', 'business_secret_scanning\.disabled_for_new_repos', 'repository_secret_scanning\.disable', 'secret_scanning_new_repos\.disable', 'secret_scanning\.disable'))

output.summary: Detects if the secret scanning feature is disabled for an enterprise or repository.

metadata.objective: False positive: Allowed administrative activities. Reference: https://docs.github.com/en/enterprise-cloud@latest/code-security/secret-scanning/about-secret-scanning
